thread.title: Great hotel
thread.title_full: Great hotel - Review of Wellington Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Gordonausieguy
title: Great hotel
text: My stay at the wellington hotel was very pleasant, hotel staff especially a guy on the reception desk were extremely helpful the hotel room was spot on, really modern comfortable and clean, and serviced each day, situated right in the heart of manhattan right next door to Carnegie hall also Central Park and time square just a five minutes walk, an added bonus is the metro is one meter from the door of the hotel entrance. "Perfect"
